post.author: 김성욱
post.content:
This is not a developer position, please have a look in details.
------------------- Hi, Brendan,
I came across your resume on Workopolis, are your currently looking for a job? we have a full time job with a major bank, I paste the job description below, if you think that you area fit and interested, please reply me asap, Thanks.
2. Systems Integrator
This role concentrates on the deployment of code packages for our client:
The key skill sets for this role are:
DB2 Java JSP Running on a Websphere platform.
RAD
Experience in these technologies is mandatory.
Main job is to package code; deploy code; test deployment and verify its working and some production system support activities
If you are an integrator with experience in deployment, or you are a developer with these skills and looking to move into integration, this is the job for you.
Location: Downtown Toronto
Hours of Work: The successful candidate has to be open to non-standard hours. Deployment is usually done in non-business hours for example the deployment can start at 6 PM and go on till 4 AM or on the weekends etc. The person has to be willing and able to work these hours as needed. Time in lieu of, or overtime is available.
Communication skills: Stellar communication skills are a requirement for this job. The successful candidate will be communicating frequently with system administrators in a variety of locations. Ability to present thoughts in a clear and succinct manner is critical to the success of the individual.
Benefits: Some of the best in the industry.
Additional Requirements - Development using DB2 on UNIX or Linux. Meaning DB2 database running on UNIX/LINUX platform (I.e operating system). The people that TD has already interviewed has experience with DB2 UDB (I.e Windows Operating system). And the DB2 on LINUX/UNIX platform is totally different in terms of admin from the Windows. Please note it is not a must to have DB2 on UNIX/LINUX skills but its super asset. _ If the candidate have developed with Windows DB2 (ie not Linux/UNIX) then he must have experience with UNIX operating system as a standalone skills - Any type of DBA certification on any platform (preferably UNIX/LINX) is super asset - Last but not least comm skills have to be 9 and above.
Regards,
Nelson Chu Consultant PentaCan
416-788-5460 nelson@pentacan.com www.pentacan.com
post.title: System Integrator, Deployment specialist, Toronto, perm
